```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
#Load data

supp <- read_csv("C:/Users/v.r.saccomanno/Desktop/Fed_Fish_Disasters/Supp_econ_table_csv_R_FINAL.csv")

```

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}


kable(supp, "latex", booktabs = T, longtable = T, align =rep("l", 8))%>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = c("striped", "full_width", "repeat_header"), font_size = 8) %>%
  #landscape(margin = NULL)%>%
  column_spec(1, width = "5em")%>%
  column_spec(2, width = "6em")%>%
  column_spec(3, width = "5em")%>%
  column_spec(4, width = "7em")%>%
  column_spec(5, width = "5em")%>%
  column_spec(6, width = "5em")%>%
  column_spec(7, width = "5em")%>%
  column_spec(8, width = "8em")%>%
  row_spec(0, bold= T)%>%
  footnote(number = c("ADFG: Alaska Department of Fish and Game", "CDWF: California Department of Fish and Wildlife",  "FFWCC: Florida Fish and Wildlife Conservation Commission", "GDNR: Georgia Department of Natural Resources/Coastal Resources Division", "NCDENR: North Carolina Department of Environment and Natural Resources", "NCDMF: North Carolina Division of Marine Fisheries", "ODFW: Oregon Department of Fish and Wildlife", "PacFIN: Pacific Fisheries Information Network", "PFMC: Pacific Fisheries Management Council", "SWFSC: Southwest Fisheries Science Center"))
 # as_image(width=8)

```
